document: Dielectric Characterization Using a Wideband Dielectric Filled Cavity (WDFC) by Mohammad Ali Saed Dissertation submitted to the Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy in Electrical Engineering APPROVED: Sedki M.
